description:
"After all the days of training, Kirino High has successfully entered the semifinals.
Kirino High gives a perfect performance with no errors for the season, but Kurokan asks the captain to make an error purposely in order to loosen the tense in the team.
Finally into the most important game with Hanaoka High, Kurokan has already planned tactics, but the opponents are not that easy to deal with.
Neither Hanaoka High nor Kirino can seem to break this deadlock."
After all the days of training, Kirino High has successfully entered the semifinals.
Kirino High gives a perfect performance with no errors for the season, but Kurokan asks the captain to make an error purposely in order to loosen the tense in the team.
Finally into the most important game with Hanaoka High, Kurokan has already planned tactics, but the opponents are not that easy to deal with.
Neither Hanaoka High nor Kirino can seem to break this deadlock.
Source: crunchyroll
